data.name: Adventurer Starter Pack 2
data.detailed_description:
Prepare for your Elsword journey with this Steam Exclusive box of essentials!

The Adventurer Starter Pack 2 contains:
1 Skill Slot Change Medal, 1 Magic Necklace (II), and 1 Ring of Skills (II) Cube

• Skill Slot Change Medal – Prepare for all of your battles by expanding your skills slots with this item. Now all of your hard-hitting skills are within reach!
• Magic Necklace (II) – This mysterious necklace will give you an additional 30% of MP when attacking or being attacked. You’ll never run out of MP with this on!
• Ring of Skills (II) Cube – This cube will allow the players to choose one of the following rings: 1 Ring of Bravery (II), 1 Ring of Strength (II), 1 Ring of Tenacity (II), and 1 Ring of Flexibility

data.short_description:
Adventurer Starter Pack 2:
Prepare for your Elsword journey with this Steam Exclusive box of essentials!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows XP
  • Processor:Intel/AMD 2GHz
  • Memory:Above 2GB
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 7 Series
  • DirectX®:Above DirectX 9.0c
  • Hard Drive:8GB Space in the hard disk
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor:Intel Core i3 or higher
  • Memory:Above 4GB
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 8 Series
  • DirectX®:Above DirectX 9.0c
  • Hard Drive:10GB Space in the hard disk
